name: Ground Unit
description: Is a unit on the ground (Soldiers, Tanks, etc) Deals 10 damage

name: Navy Unit
description: Is a unit in the ocean (Ships, Submarines, etc) Deals 10 damage

name: Air Unit
description: Is a unit in the air (Airplanes, Helicopters, etc) Deals 10 damage

name: Robot Dog
description: Robot dogs are mechanical robots that have the anatomical shape of a dog, these are very useful, as they can be strapped up with guns or other weapons. Deals 20 damage

name: Faulty EMP Driver Blaster
description: Able to disable/destroy any nearby devices (E.G. Communication lines,war robots,mobile phones etc.) Can take out 20-40% of electrical devices (in your items)

name: Polished EMP Driver Blaster
description: Able to disable/destroy any nearby devices (E.G. Communication lines,war robots,mobile phones etc.) Can take out 50-70% of electrical devices (in your items) and might stop a nuke (IHQ 2.2 only) (Except DextraNuke)

name: Superior EMP Driver Blaster
description: Able to disable/destroy any nearby devices (E.G. Communication lines,war robots,mobile phones etc.) Can take out 80-100% of electrical devices (in your items) and might stop a nuke (IHQ 2.2 only) (Except DextraNuke)

name: Nuke
description: Nuke is a powerful weapon that can destroy an entire city. It is a very powerful weapon, but it is quite dangerous. Deals 100 damage

name: HyperNuke
description: Hypernuke is a powerful weapon that can destroy an entire state/province. It is a very powerful weapon, but it is also very dangerous. It is not recommended to use for testing on country/land that is not completely empty. Deals 200 damage

name: DextraNuke
description: DextraNuke is a powerful weapon that can destroy an entire country. Highly dangerous, do not even buy, or use, unless you are insane. Deals 500 damage

name: Medical Aid
description: Cures 60 HP, has a max use of 5, being able to heal 300 HP at a time

name: Lightning Sandwich Packet
description: Cures 40 HP, has a max use of 5, being able to heal 200 HP at a time
